code: import api from'./api';export const authService={login:async(email,password)=>{try{const response=await api.post('/auth/login',{email,password});return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}},register:async userData=>{try{const response=await api.post('/auth/register',userData);return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}},getCurrentUser:async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/auth/me');return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}}};
